text.autoconfig.textweaks.title: TexTweaks - Reload textures to apply effects
text.autoconfig.textweaks.option.enableT: Needed for higher mipmap levels if not all textures have the same resolution
text.autoconfig.textweaks.option.texture: Textures higher than this resolution will be unaffected
text.autoconfig.textweaks.option.maxScal: Cap maximum scaling power in case something breaks
text.autoconfig.textweaks.option.maxMipm: Override Minecraft mipmap level (can go above 4)
Higher mipmap levels will need more VRAM
Actual value will be reduced based on texture size
text.autoconfig.textweaks.option.lodBias: Set texture level of detail (LOD) bias for mipmaps
<0: Texture LOD is reduced at a farther distance
>0: Texture LOD is reduced at a closer distance
text.autoconfig.textweaks.option.fractal: Removes a pixel during each scaling step which creates a fractal like effect on scaled textures
